recipe_name: Quinoa salad with mint and mango
author: Paul Rankin
method: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix together.  Serve with grilled halloumi, chicken, fish or any leftover meats.
ingredients: 110g/4oz quinoa, cooked according to packet instructions,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint,  4 spring onions, including the green parts, chopped,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  1 mango, peeled, finely chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  Â½ lemon, juice only
